TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. it is unfinished and extremely buggy. Also, you got it from a torrent cause you are impatient and it has a virus that infects your computer and replaces all your programs with a link to a random website.

I wish for infinite cupcakes.

Granted, you get lots of cupcakes... with raisins, and nobody likes raisins.

I wish for losta muffins.

Edited March 14, 2015 by Colserra3
herpderp

Granted. You get a lot of muffins. With raisins. Nobody likes raisins.

I wish for HDPE.

Granted, you are now made of HDPE. Good luck moving. Or breathing. Or thinking. Or anything really.

I wish for an nuclear bomb with no means of detonating it.

Granted. One idiot didn't know it cannot be detonated and managed to detonate it. And of course, you were standing right next to the bomb when it happened.

I wish for peace on Earth.

Granted. Everyone has nuclear bombs now.

I wish for the ability to turn logs into sticks with my fists.

Granted. It's a lot slower than using an axe. It also hurts like hell.

I wish to have a space suit.

Granted it a very holes shirt

I wish for a domestic cat

granted. it's evil and infected with zombie virus

I want you for the us army.

granted.

But I'm very lazy, so lazy that you fire me due to inefficacy.

I wish for a perfect forum, one that shouldn't be moderated

Granted. It's so perfectly evil that you give up on moderating it.

I wish for an ore detector.

Granted. It's made of ore, and detects itself.

I wish to know more coin tricks. I looked up Apollo Robbins, watched 1 video for 5 minutes, and man... changed my life.

Granted. You are insanely good at making coins dissapear.. but you cant make them reappear for the life of you.

Eventually you end up broke.

As for making up money by being an attraction, you still end up with negative profits.

I wish for more wishes.

Granted, at the cost of planet Earth.

I wish for good luck at my upcoming outing/date/hangout/whatever we youngsters say these days...

Granted. You get however many wishes you want. Each subsequent wish is going to get corrupted even more than the last one, though.

Ninja'd. This time fairly.

So.. Granted. Your luck is immense and you have a great time. Everyone else is jealous of such luck and hates it (and you) with passion.

I wish to be less lazy.

Edited March 15, 2015 by Deutherius

Granted. On the day you finally go outside, you collapse from fatigue and being out of shape, and decide to eat Pizza the rest of your life.

I wish for my broken computer to work again...

(Don't worry guys, I saved my DMSP save!)

(How is that a corrupted wish? That sounds delicious! )

Granted. Your computer works again. Every other electronic device you own breaks.

I wish for the promised pizza.

Granted. It was baked in Chernobyl's 4th block reactor back when it exploded.

I wish for a non-radioactive, non-toxic, non-harmful piece of sweet food.

Granted. It tastes so good... But as it has a fair amount of sugar in it, you swiftly develop dental cavities.

I wish for a nice book to read.

Granted. But your house burns down along with the book.

I wish for October to be the eighth month instead. (We can just skip ten and have two eights.)

Granted. When reaching August, the Earth suddenly accelerates to ludicrous speed in order to move itself two months in it's trajectory in an instant. You, not expecting this speed bump, spill your drink. (Also, it moves back at the end of the month, so you spill your drink again. Darn it, Earth!)

I wish for an epic beard.

Ummm you ninjaed sorry

i wish for friends

You got some.

They had Ebola.

One spat on you.

I wish to go on a long term deep space mission with my crush.

Granted. She (or he) absolutely hates you and blows you out of the airlock.

I wish for a sandwich.

(That's not how ninjaing works, Ethanadams)

Granted. The sandwich has that one ingredient you really hate inside of it.

I still wish for the epic beard.
